content.rendered:
Directed by Vasan Bala.

Written by Vasan Bala. Santanu Ghatak. Hussain Haidry. Garima Obrah.

Cast Abhimanyu Dasani(Surya). Radhika Madan(Supri). Mahesh Manjrekar(Surya’s Grandpa / Ajoba). Gulshan Devaiah(Jimmy / Karate Mani). Shweta Basu Prasad(Amma – Surya’s Mother (as Shweta Prasad)). Jimit Trivedi(Jatin). Sartaaj Kakkar(Young Surya). Riva Arora(Young Supri). Dhruvansh Solanki(Baby Surya). Elena Kazan(Nandini). Satyajit Ganu(Atul). Nishad Raj Rana(Supri’s Father). Loveleen Mishra(Supri’s Mother). Vikrant Bakshi(Karate Chandru). Harshal Mahendra Maru(Young Karate Mani). Harsh Mahendra Maru(Young Jimmy). Ratheesh U.K.(Pablo). Priyank Tiwari(Karate Mani Student 1). Shubham Ray(Karate Mani Student 2). Farooque Khan(Atul’s Father). Nilofar Gesawat(Atul’s Mother). Prateek Parmar(Samurai / baby face). Harsha Sharma(Doctor). Sameer Chandra(Principal). Aditi Dogra(Nurse) . Samir Chandra(School Principal). Aditya Jawalkar(Helper guy with supri). Nick Nag(Younger Abhimanyu). Ram Charan Sirka((as Ram Charn Sirka))

Languages Hindi. English. Marathi. Malayalam.

Producers Ankita Chowfin. Ankita Chowfin. Pashan Jal. Salona Bains Joshi. Sonia Kanwar. Ankur Khanna. Umesh Pawar. Zahoor Qadir. Ronnie Screwvala. Prafull Sharma. Shubh Shivdasani. Ishwar Singh. Ravi Tiwari. Sanaya Irani Zohrabi.

Production Absolute Production. RSV.
